name: The Snow Elf
description:
Waking in a strange land with no memory of who or what he is, a young man must travel the world to discover his origins and try to get back home. 

Welcome to the world of Saldaria, the world in which our tale takes place. Battle through a variety of elemental enemies, unlock the secrets of the Snow Elves alongside your three  companions, and see this tale through to its happy - or perhaps not! - conclusion.

Started in March 2020 and completed in November 2020, The Snow Elf is our first project. As such, while it has been playtested, bugs may remain and we ask that they be reported for fixing. 

We hope you enjoy playing The Snow Elf as much as we enjoyed building it!
